about_the_game:
Are you ready to empower these incredible girls on their quest for success? Lace up your virtual boots, adjust your headphones, and prepare to be swept away by the unstoppable rhythm of "Girls Unleashed: Career Conquerors." With its unique blend of platforming thrills and addictive music-based gameplay, this is one game that will leave you feeling empowered, inspired, and hungry for more.

Game Feature

  • Step into the digital shoes of four captivating Vtubers and guide them on their path to virtual stardom.
  • Experience the thrilling fusion of platforming mastery and rhythm-based music gameplay, creating a unique and addictive adventure.
  • Unleash your talent and showmanship by perfectly timing your strikes on ground and airborne obstacles.
  • Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing soundtrack comprising 16 handpicked songs, each tailored to match the intensity of every level.
  • Master an innovative control scheme that balances simplicity and depth, allowing you to become a true rhythm virtuoso.
  • Explore visually stunning virtual realms, each meticulously designed to reflect the personality and career of your Vtubers.
  • Witness the captivating rise of virtual celebrities and be a part of their journey to global stardom.
  • Prepare to captivate the world and become a virtual sensation in this groundbreaking game experience.

Control

- Press key J to hit the ground obstacle and press F key to hit the air obstacle when it reaching the marker in front of the character.
- Hold key to perform a long singing note.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature imagery. Users can unlock characters in the game where they are wearing revealing costumes.

name: VTuber Beats Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Getting so bored with the reality, you download Vtuber Beats, a recently very popular streamer app to kill the time. Here you will encounter many gorgeous, talent streamers showing off their skills. Your job is to impress them and maybe get to date them in real life, who knows.
